Structs/DeleteOldValuesAccumulationStrat.name: accumulate(oldItems:newItems:)
Structs/DeleteOldValuesAccumulationStrat.abstract: Accumulate oldItems and newItems into resulting array by deleting old items, that have new values in newItems, from oldItems.

Structs/UpdateOldValuesAccumulationStrat.name: accumulate(oldItems:newItems:)
Structs/UpdateOldValuesAccumulationStrat.abstract: Accumulate oldItems and newItems into resulting array by updating old items with new values, using old item positions in collection.

Structs/AdditiveAccumulationStrategy.htm.name: accumulate(oldItems:newItems:)
Structs/AdditiveAccumulationStrategy.htm.abstract: Accumulate oldItems and newItems into resulting array by appending newItems to oldItems.

Structs/AdditiveAccumulationStrategy.htm.name: AdditiveAccumulationStrategy
Structs/AdditiveAccumulationStrategy.htm.abstract: Strategy, that adds new items to old items, without comparing their identifiers.

Structs/UpdateOldValuesAccumulationStrat.name: UpdateOldValuesAccumulationStrategy
Structs/UpdateOldValuesAccumulationStrat.abstract: Strategy to update old values with a new ones, using old items position.

Structs/DeleteOldValuesAccumulationStrat.name: DeleteOldValuesAccumulationStrategy
Structs/DeleteOldValuesAccumulationStrat.abstract: Strategy to delete old values when accumulating newItems

Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html#/s:1.name: headerModelProvider
Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html#/s:1.abstract: Returns a header model for specified section index or nil.

Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html#/s:1.name: footerModelProvider
Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html#/s:1.abstract: Returns a footer model for specified section index or nil

Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html#/s:1.name: supplementaryModelProvider
Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html#/s:1.abstract: Returns supplementary model for specified section indexPath and supplementary kind, or nil.

Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html#/s:1.name: supplementaryHeaderKind
Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html#/s:1.abstract: Supplementary kind for header in current storage

Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html#/s:1.name: supplementaryFooterKind
Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html#/s:1.abstract: Supplementary kind for footer in current storage

Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html#/s:1.name: headerModel(forSection:)
Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html#/s:1.abstract: Returns header model from section with section index or nil, if it was not set.

Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html#/s:1.name: footerModel(forSection:)
Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html#/s:1.abstract: Returns footer model from section with section index or nil, if it was not set.

Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html#/s:1.name: supplementaryModel(ofKind:forSectionAt:)
Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html#/s:1.abstract: Returns supplementary model of kind for section at indexPath.

Protocols/EntityIdentifiable.html#/s:14D.name: identifier
Protocols/EntityIdentifiable.html#/s:14D.abstract: Unique identifier of object. It must never change for this specific object.

Protocols/SectionLocatable.html#/s:14DTM.name: sectionLocationDelegate
Protocols/SectionLocatable.html#/s:14DTM.abstract: delegate, that knows about current section index in storage.

Protocols/SectionLocationIdentifyable.ht.name: sectionIndex(for:)
Protocols/SectionLocationIdentifyable.ht.abstract: Returns section index for section, or nil if section was not found.

Protocols/Section.html#/s:14DTModelStora.name: item(at:)
Protocols/Section.html#/s:14DTModelStora.abstract: Returns an item at index, if it exists in Section.

Protocols/ModelTransfer.html#/s:14DTMode.name: ModelType
Protocols/ModelTransfer.html#/s:14DTMode.abstract: Type of model that is being transferred

Protocols/ModelTransfer.html#/s:14DTMode.name: modelCondition(_:)
Protocols/ModelTransfer.html#/s:14DTMode.abstract: Returns custom MappingCondition that allows to customize mappings based on IndexPath and ModelType.

Protocols/StorageUpdating.html#/s:14DTMo.name: storageNeedsReloading()
Protocols/StorageUpdating.html#/s:14DTMo.abstract: Method is called when UI needs to be fully updated for data storage changes.

Protocols/AnomalyHandler.html#/s:14DTMod.name: silenceAnomaly(usingCondition:)
Protocols/AnomalyHandler.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Silences anomalies, based on provided condition. If this condition returns true, anomalyHandler will not be called for this anomaly.

Protocols/AccumulationStrategy.html.name: AccumulationStrategy
Protocols/AccumulationStrategy.html.abstract: Strategy to accumulate oldItems and newItems into resulting array.

Protocols/AnomalyHandler.html.name: AnomalyHandler
Protocols/AnomalyHandler.html.abstract: AnomalyHandler protocol serves as interface for various anomaly handlers.

Protocols/StorageUpdating.html.name: StorageUpdating
Protocols/StorageUpdating.html.abstract: StorageUpdating protocol is used to transfer data storage updates.

Protocols/ModelTransfer.html.name: ModelTransfer
Protocols/ModelTransfer.html.abstract: Protocol used to pass model data to your cell or supplementary view. Every cell or supplementary view you have should conform to this protocol.

Protocols/Section.html.name: Section
Protocols/Section.html.abstract: Section protocol defines an interface for sections returned by DTModelStorage object.

Protocols/SectionLocatable.html.name: SectionLocatable
Protocols/SectionLocatable.html.abstract: Allows access to supplementaries for specific section

Protocols/EntityIdentifiable.html.name: EntityIdentifiable
Protocols/EntityIdentifiable.html.abstract: A type that can be identified by identifier.

Protocols/HashableDiffingAlgorithm.html.name: HashableDiffingAlgorithm
Protocols/HashableDiffingAlgorithm.html.abstract: Algorithm that requires elements in collection to be Hashable

Protocols/EquatableDiffingAlgorithm.html.name: EquatableDiffingAlgorithm
Protocols/EquatableDiffingAlgorithm.html.abstract: Algorithm that requires elements in collection to be Equatable

Protocols/Storage.html.name: Storage
Protocols/Storage.html.abstract: Storage protocol is used to define common interface for storage classes.

Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html.name: SupplementaryStorage
Protocols/SupplementaryStorage.html.abstract: SupplementaryStorage is used to handle header/footer and supplementary models in storage.

Extensions/UINib.html#/s:So5UINibC14DTMo.name: nibExists(withNibName:inBundle:)
Extensions/UINib.html#/s:So5UINibC14DTMo.abstract: Returns true, if nib file with nibName exists in bundle.

Enums/ViewType.html#/s:14DTModelStorage8.name: supplementaryKind()
Enums/ViewType.html#/s:14DTModelStorage8.abstract: Returns supplementaryKind for .supplementaryView case, nil for .cell case.

Enums/ViewType.html#/s:14DTModelStorage8.name: mappingCandidates(for:withModel:at:)
Enums/ViewType.html#/s:14DTModelStorage8.abstract: Returns mappings candidates of correct viewType, for which modelTypeCheckingBlock with model returns true.

Enums/MemoryStorageError/InsertionReason.name: InsertionReason
Enums/MemoryStorageError/InsertionReason.abstract: Errors that can happen when inserting items into memory storage - insertItem(_:to:) method

Enums/MemoryStorageError/SearchReason.ht.name: SearchReason
Enums/MemoryStorageError/SearchReason.ht.abstract: Errors that can happen when replacing item in memory storage - replaceItem(_:with:) method

Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html#/s:14DTM.name: insertionIndexPathTooBig(indexPath:countOfElementsInSection:)
Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html#/s:14DTM.abstract: When inserting item to indexPath, there were only countOfElementsInSection items in section

Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html#/s:14DTM.name: batchInsertionItemCountMismatch(itemsCount:indexPathsCount:)
Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html#/s:14DTM.abstract: When inserting batch of items, number of items and number of indexPaths was different

Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html#/s:14DTM.name: replaceItemFailedItemNotFound(itemDescription:)
Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html#/s:14DTM.abstract: Attempt to replace item, that is not found in storage

Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html#/s:14DTM.name: removeItemFailedItemNotFound(itemDescription:)
Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html#/s:14DTM.abstract: Attempt to remove item, that is not found in storage

Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html#/s:14DTM.name: moveItemFailedItemNotFound(indexPath:)
Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html#/s:14DTM.abstract: Attempt to move item, that is not found in storage

Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html#/s:14DTM.name: moveItemFailedIndexPathTooBig(indexPath:countOfElementsInSection:)
Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html#/s:14DTM.abstract: Attempt to move item to too big indexPath.

Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html#/s:14DTM.name: moveItemFailedInvalidIndexPaths(sourceIndexPath:destinationIndexPath:sourceElementsInSection:destinationElementsInSection:)
Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html#/s:14DTM.abstract: Inconsistent indexPaths when moving item from sourceIndexPath to destinationIndexPath.

Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html#/s:14DTM.name: description
Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html#/s:14DTM.abstract: Short description for MemoryStorageAnomaly. Useful for sending to analytics, which might have character limit.

Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html.name: MemoryStorageAnomaly
Enums/MemoryStorageAnomaly.html.abstract: MemoryStorageAnomaly represents various errors and unwanted behaviors that can happen when using MemoryStorage class.

Enums/MemoryStorageError.html.name: MemoryStorageError
Enums/MemoryStorageError.html.abstract: This struct contains error types that can be thrown for various MemoryStorage errors

Enums/RuntimeHelper.html.name: RuntimeHelper
Enums/RuntimeHelper.html.abstract: This class is used to introspect Swift and Objective-C types, providing necessary mapping information.

Enums/ChangeType.html.name: ChangeType
Enums/ChangeType.html.abstract: Possible change types for objects and sections

Enums/ViewType.html.name: ViewType
Enums/ViewType.html.abstract: ViewType enum allows differentiating between mappings for different kinds of views. For example, UICollectionView headers might use ViewType.supplementaryView(UICollectionElementKindSectionHeader) value.

Enums/MappingCondition.html.name: MappingCondition
Enums/MappingCondition.html.abstract: Defines condition, under which mapping is going to be applied.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: viewType
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: View type for this mapping

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: viewClass
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: View class, that will be used for current mapping

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: xibName
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Xib name for mapping. This value will not be nil only if XIBs are used for this particular mapping.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: bundle
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Bundle in which resources for this mapping will be searched for. For example, DTTableViewManager uses this property to get bundle, from which xib file for UITableViewCell will be retrieved. Defaults to Bundle(for: T.self).

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: modelTypeCheckingBlock
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Type checking block, that will verify whether passed model should be mapped to viewClass.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: modelTypeTypeCheckingBlock
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Closure, that can be used to check model type when model is not available(generic context for example, when model Type is available only).

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: updateBlock
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Type-erased update block, that will be called when ModelTransfer update(with:) method needs to be executed.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: condition
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Mapping condition, under which this mapping is going to work. Defaults to .none.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: reuseIdentifier
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Reuse identifier to be used for reusable views. Mappings for UICollectionViewCell and UICollectionReusableView on iOS 14 / tvOS 14 and higher ignore this parameter unless you are using storyboard prototyped cells or supplementary views.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: cellRegisteredByStoryboard
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: If cell is designed in storyboard, and thus don’t require explicit UITableView/UICollectionView registration, please set this property to true. Defaults to false.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: supplementaryRegisteredByStoryboard
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: If supplementary view is designed in storyboard, and thus don’t require explicit UITableView/UICollectionView registration, please set this property to true. Defaults to false.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: reactions
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Event reactions, attached to current mapping instance

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: modelCondition(_:)
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Returns custom MappingCondition that allows to customize mappings based on IndexPath and ModelType.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: init(viewType:viewClass:xibName:mappingBlock:)
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: init(cellConfiguration:mapping:)
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Creates ViewModelMapping for UICollectionViewCell registration.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: init(cellConfiguration:mapping:)
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Creates ViewModelMapping for UITableViewCell registration.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: init(cellConfiguration:mapping:)
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Creates ViewModelMapping for UICollectionViewCell registration. This initializer is used, when UICollectionViewCell conforms to ModelTransfer protocol.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: init(cellConfiguration:mapping:)
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Creates ViewModelMapping for UITableViewCell registration. This initializer is used, when UICollectionViewCell conforms to ModelTransfer protocol.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: init(kind:supplementaryConfiguration:mapping:)
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Creates ViewModelMapping for UICollectionReusableView registration.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: init(kind:headerFooterConfiguration:mapping:)
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Creates ViewModelMapping for UITableView header/footer registration.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: init(kind:supplementaryConfiguration:mapping:)
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Creates ViewModelMapping for UICollectionReusableView registration. This initializer is used, when UICollectionSupplementaryView conforms to ModelTransfer protocol.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: init(kind:headerFooterConfiguration:mapping:)
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Creates ViewModelMapping for UITableView header/footer registration. This initializer is used when header/footer conforms to ModelTransfer protocol.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: updateCell(cell:at:with:)
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Update cell at indexPath with model. This can be used in scenarios where you want to update a cell, but animations are not required.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: dequeueConfiguredReusableCell(for:model:indexPath:)
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Dequeues reusable cell for model, indexPath from tableView. Calls cellConfiguration closure, that was passed to initializer, then calls ModelTransfer.update(with:) if this cell conforms to ModelTransfer protocol.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: dequeueConfiguredReusableSupplementaryView(for:kind:model:indexPath:)
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Dequeues reusable supplementary view for model, indexPath from tableView. Calls headerFooterConfiguration closure, that was passed to initializer, then calls ModelTransfer.update(with:) if this header/footer conforms to ModelTransfer protocol.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: dequeueConfiguredReusableCell(for:model:indexPath:)
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Dequeues reusable cell for model, indexPath from collectionView. Calls cellConfiguration closure, that was passed to initializer, then calls ModelTransfer.update(with:) if this cell conforms to ModelTransfer protocol.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.name: dequeueConfiguredReusableSupplementaryView(for:kind:model:indexPath:)
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html#/s:14DTMod.abstract: Dequeues reusable supplementary view for model, indexPath from tableView. Calls supplementaryConfiguration closure, that was passed to initializer, then calls ModelTransfer.update(with:) if this header/footer conforms to ModelTransfer protocol.

Classes/StorageUpdate.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: objectChanges
Classes/StorageUpdate.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: Object changes in update, in order of occurence

Classes/StorageUpdate.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: sectionChanges
Classes/StorageUpdate.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: Section changes in update, in order of occurence

Classes/StorageUpdate.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: updatedObjects
Classes/StorageUpdate.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: Objects that were updated, with initial index paths

Classes/StorageUpdate.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: containsDeferredDatasourceUpdates
Classes/StorageUpdate.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: If update contains deferred datasource updates, they need to be applied before applying any animations.

Classes/StorageUpdate.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: enqueuedDatasourceUpdates
Classes/StorageUpdate.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: Enqueued datasource updates for later execution. This can be used by UICollectionView and UITableView batch updates mechanisms to update datasources inside of performBatchUpdates(_:completion:) method.

Classes/StorageUpdate.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: applyDeferredDatasourceUpdates()
Classes/StorageUpdate.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: Call this method to apply all deferred datasource updates.

Classes/StorageUpdate.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: enqueueDatasourceUpdate(_:)
Classes/StorageUpdate.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: Enqueues datasource update for later execution into enqueuedDatasourceUpdates property. This can be used by UICollectionView and UITableView batch updates mechanisms to update datasources inside of performBatchUpdates(_:completion:) method.

Classes/SingleSectionStorage.html#/s:14D.name: numberOfSections()
Classes/SingleSectionStorage.html#/s:14D.abstract: Returns number of sections in a storage

Classes/SingleSectionStorage.html#/s:14D.name: numberOfItems(inSection:)
Classes/SingleSectionStorage.html#/s:14D.abstract: Returns number of items in a given section

Classes/SingleSectionStorage.html#/s:14D.name: init(items:)
Classes/SingleSectionStorage.html#/s:14D.abstract: Creates storage with array of items. Do not call this method directly. Instead use concrete subclasses of SingleSectionStorage, such as SingleSectionEquatableStorage.

Classes/SingleSectionStorage.html#/s:14D.name: calculateDiffs(to:)
Classes/SingleSectionStorage.html#/s:14D.abstract: Abstract method to calculate diffs. Do not use this method directly. Instead, use subclassed method, for example SingleSectionEquatableStorage.calculateDiffs(to:).

Classes/SingleSectionStorage.html#/s:14D.name: setItems(_:)
Classes/SingleSectionStorage.html#/s:14D.abstract: Replaces items with newItems, collecting changes along the way. Changes are calculated using calculateDiffs(to:) method and delivered to StorageUpdating delegate, which can animate changes in resulting UI(for example UITableView or UICollectionView).

Classes/SingleSectionStorage.html#/s:14D.name: addItems(_:_:)
Classes/SingleSectionStorage.html#/s:14D.abstract: Adds newItems on top of items, using specified accumulation strategy.

Classes/SingleSectionHashableStorage.htm.name: differ
Classes/SingleSectionHashableStorage.htm.abstract: Diffing algorithm that requires all it’s elements to be Hashable.

Classes/SingleSectionHashableStorage.htm.name: init(items:differ:)
Classes/SingleSectionHashableStorage.htm.abstract: Creates storage with items and concrete implementation of HashableDiffingAlgorithm - differ.

Classes/SingleSectionEquatableStorage.ht.name: differ
Classes/SingleSectionEquatableStorage.ht.abstract: Diffing algorithm that requires all it’s elements to be Equatable.

Classes/SingleSectionEquatableStorage.ht.name: init(items:differ:)
Classes/SingleSectionEquatableStorage.ht.abstract: Creates storage with items and concrete implementation of EquatableDiffingAlgorithm - differ.

Classes/SectionModel.html#/s:14DTModelSt.name: item(at:)
Classes/SectionModel.html#/s:14DTModelSt.abstract: Returns item at index, if it exists, nil otherwise.

Classes/SectionModel.html#/s:14DTModelSt.name: sectionLocationDelegate
Classes/SectionModel.html#/s:14DTModelSt.abstract: delegate, that knows about current section index in storage.

Classes/MemoryStorageAnomalyHandler.html.name: defaultAction
Classes/MemoryStorageAnomalyHandler.html.abstract: Default action to perform when anomaly is detected. Prints debugDescription of anomaly by default.

Classes/MemoryStorageAnomalyHandler.html.name: anomalyAction
Classes/MemoryStorageAnomalyHandler.html.abstract: Action to perform when anomaly is detected. Defaults to defaultAction.

Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: anomalyHandler
Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: Anomaly handler, that handles reported by MemoryStorage anomalies.

Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: numberOfItems(inSection:)
Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: Returns number of items in a given section

Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: sectionIndex(for:)
Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: Returns index of section or nil, if section is now found

Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: totalNumberOfItems
Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: Returns total number of items contained in all MemoryStorage sections

Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: item(at:)
Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: Returns item at indexPath or nil, if it is not found.

Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: setItemsForAllSections(_:)
Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: Sets items for sections in memory storage. This method creates all required sections, if necessary.

Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: setSection(_:forSection:)
Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: Sets section for index. This will reload UI after updating

Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: items(inSection:)
Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: Returns items in section with section index, or nil if section does not exist

Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: indexPath(forItem:)
Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: Returns indexPath of searchableItem in MemoryStorage or nil, if it’s not found.

Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: section(atIndex:)
Classes/MemoryStorage.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: Returns section at sectionIndex or nil, if it does not exist

Classes/FiveArgumentsEventReaction.html#.name: init(_:modelType:argumentOne:argumentTwo:signature:_:)
Classes/FiveArgumentsEventReaction.html#.abstract: Creates five argument event reaction for View/Cell model mapped events.

Classes/FourArgumentsEventReaction.html#.name: init(_:modelType:argument:signature:_:)
Classes/FourArgumentsEventReaction.html#.abstract: Creates four argument event reaction for View/Cell mapped reactions.

Classes/EventReaction.html#/s:14DTModelS.name: reaction
Classes/EventReaction.html#/s:14DTModelS.abstract: 3 arguments reaction block with all arguments type-erased.

Classes/CoreDataStorage.html#/s:14DTMode.name: numberOfItems(inSection:)
Classes/CoreDataStorage.html#/s:14DTMode.abstract: Returns number of items in a given section

Classes/CoreDataStorage.html#/s:14DTMode.name: controllerWillChangeContent(_:)
Classes/CoreDataStorage.html#/s:14DTMode.abstract: NSFetchedResultsController is about to start changing content - we’ll start monitoring for updates.

Classes/BaseUpdateDeliveringStorage.html.name: batchUpdatesInProgress
Classes/BaseUpdateDeliveringStorage.html.abstract: Batch updates are in progress. If true, update will not be finished.

Classes/BaseUpdateDeliveringStorage.html.name: performUpdates(_:)
Classes/BaseUpdateDeliveringStorage.html.abstract: Performs update block in storage. After update is finished, delegate will be notified.

Classes/BaseSupplementaryStorage.html#/s.name: headerModelProvider
Classes/BaseSupplementaryStorage.html#/s.abstract: Returns a header model for specified section index or nil.

Classes/BaseSupplementaryStorage.html#/s.name: footerModelProvider
Classes/BaseSupplementaryStorage.html#/s.abstract: Returns a footer model for specified section index or nil

Classes/BaseSupplementaryStorage.html#/s.name: supplementaryModelProvider
Classes/BaseSupplementaryStorage.html#/s.abstract: Returns supplementary model for specified section indexPath and supplementary kind, or nil. Setter for this property is overridden to allow calling headerModelProvider and footerModelProvider closures.

Classes/BaseSupplementaryStorage.html#/s.name: supplementaryHeaderKind
Classes/BaseSupplementaryStorage.html#/s.abstract: Supplementary kind for header in current storage

Classes/BaseSupplementaryStorage.html#/s.name: supplementaryFooterKind
Classes/BaseSupplementaryStorage.html#/s.abstract: Supplementary kind for footer in current storage

Classes/BaseSupplementaryStorage.html.name: BaseSupplementaryStorage
Classes/BaseSupplementaryStorage.html.abstract: BaseSupplementaryStorage is a base class, that implements common functionality for SupplementaryStorage protocol and serves as a base class for MemoryStorage, CoreDataStorage, SingleSectionStorage, RealmStorage.

Classes/CoreDataStorage.html.name: CoreDataStorage
Classes/CoreDataStorage.html.abstract: This class represents model storage in CoreData

Classes/FourArgumentsEventReaction.html.name: FourArgumentsEventReaction
Classes/FourArgumentsEventReaction.html.abstract: Subclass of EventReaction, tuned to work with 4 arguments.

Classes/FiveArgumentsEventReaction.html.name: FiveArgumentsEventReaction
Classes/FiveArgumentsEventReaction.html.abstract: Subclass of EventReaction, tuned to work with 5 arguments.

Classes/SingleSectionEquatableStorage.ht.name: SingleSectionEquatableStorage
Classes/SingleSectionEquatableStorage.ht.abstract: SingleSectionStorage that requires all it’s elements to be Equatable.

Classes/SingleSectionHashableStorage.htm.name: SingleSectionHashableStorage
Classes/SingleSectionHashableStorage.htm.abstract: SingleSectionStorage that requires all it’s elements to be Hashable.

Classes/SingleSectionStorage.html.name: SingleSectionStorage
Classes/SingleSectionStorage.html.abstract: Abstract base class that represents a single section of items. Supports supplementary items to allow representing supplementary views in section.

Classes/ViewModelMapping.html.name: ViewModelMapping
Classes/ViewModelMapping.html.abstract: ViewModelMapping class serves to store mappings, and capture model and cell types.

Global%20Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global%20Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
